metadata.title: CVE-2018-10528 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibRaw 0.18.9. There is a stack-based bufferoverflow in the utf2char function in libraw_cxx.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10528` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.3
libraw15 - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.1-1ubuntu0.3').
ufraw package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
